title: Professional Magnetic Button

title: Hover Glow Effect

title: Magnetic Hover Effect
description: Elements follow the cursor in a magnetic-like motion when hovered, creating an interactive and engaging experience.

title: Split Text Hover Effect

description: A professional fluid animation on hover with elegant ripple effects and corporate styling.
